hs_auth_canceled.message: Request was canceled by the user.

hs_auth_locked_desc.message: The current website is trying to send a request to the Keysign browser extension. Please enter your password below to unlock the wallet and continue.

hs_init_no_wallet.description: when user didnt create a wallet yet

hs_lifecycle_request_canceled.message: Request was canceled by the user.
hs_lifecycle_request_canceled.description: Generic answer to websites when user cancel transaction (in the background so it wont show on screen)

hs_bgd_broadcast.message: The transaction has been broadcasted successfully.

hs_bgd_error.message: There was an error broadcasting this transaction:

hs_bgd_error_broadcasting.message: There was an error broadcasting this transaction, please try again.

hs_bgd_transfer_success.message:
Successfully transferred $1 TNBC

From:
$2
To:
$3

hs_bgd_verify_error.message: Account number don't match selected wallet signing key.

description.description: Extension description, as shown in the store.

dialog_broadcasting.description: When a website requested a transaction and it was approved.

dialog_extensions.description: When website request a generic broadcast

dialog_header_unlock.description: When website request a transaction but keysign is locked

dialog_message.description: When website request a custom json

dialog_register_error.description: Person needs to create a master password and wallet.

import_html_error.message:
There was an error importing your keys.
Make sure you that you are using the same master key than when you exported the file.

import_html_text.message:
Import your keys from another keysign instance using a .txt file.

You need to use the same master password on both instances to decrypt the keys.

popup_account_redeem.message: You have Rewards ready to redeem in the amount of
popup_account_redeem.description: On claim reward page (click little gift icon from main page when rewards are available to claim)

popup_accounts_already_have_key.description: when trying to add a new key for the wallets (in manage wallets), but the key is already there.

popup_accounts_already_registered.message: You already registered a wallet for $1!
popup_accounts_already_registered.description: when trying to add a wallet already saved on keysign

popup_accounts_fill.description: when adding new wallet but not filling all fields

popup_accounts_incorrect_key.message: Incorrect account number or signing key.
popup_accounts_incorrect_key.description: when adding new wallet with incorrect key

popup_accounts_try_again.description: Generic unknown error, user is invited to try again

popup_bank_add.description: On preferences, bank dropdown. BANK stands for bank node

popup_bank_invalid_url.description: On preferences >Add BANK > when url entered is invalid

popup_bank_exists.description: On preferences >Add BANK > when url entered is already exists

popup_broadcast.description: On preferences, list of rights that were given to some websites.

popup_html_about_text.message:
Keysign is an extension browser wallet created to work with TheNewBoston Blockchain

It was developed and designed by both MrSky and Abhay.

popup_html_accountNumber.description: When adding an wallet via Account number

popup_html_add_by_keys.description: When adding new wallet. In a button, must keep short.

popup_html_add_generate_keys.description: When adding new wallet. In a button, must keep short.

popup_html_add_key.description: on manage wallets, add a key not currently stored.

popup_html_al_default_info.message: Lock the keysign manually or when the browser is closed.

popup_html_al_idle_info.message: Auto-lock the keysign after the browser window is idle for the specified number of minutes.

popup_html_al_locked_info.message: Auto-lock the keysign when the device locks.

popup_html_balance.description: When initiating a TNBC transfer. $1 is a variable that will be replaced by a currency name.

popup_html_change_password_text.message: Input your old password for confirmation, then chose a new password.

popup_html_chose_add_method.message:
You can add your keys by entering a Account Number and Signing key.
Alternatives include Generating a Wallet or importing your keys.

popup_html_copied.description: on preferences when clicking on a key

popup_html_generate_wallet_text.message: If you want to add a new wallet by generate all you have to do is put a wallet name and click save. It will generate your Account Number/ Signing key and save them.
popup_html_generate_wallet_text.description: On Add new wallet => via generate

popup_html_import_export_text.message:
You can export all your keys encrypted in a file. This will allow you to import them to keysign on another device or simply safeguard them.

When importing, only accounts that are not already present on the instance will be added.

popup_html_import_success.message:
Import successful!

Please select the Keys you wish to store with tnb keysign:
popup_html_import_success.description: When adding an wallet via master key

popup_html_loading.description: When initiating a TNBC transfer and the balance is loading.

popup_html_pref_info.message: The default bank is set by keysign. To add a new bank click ADD BANK in dropdown.

popup_html_register.message:
The best way to access your TNB wallets. Manage TNB assets, and connect to TNB applications. Keysign is Simple. Lightweight and Secure.

Lets start by creating a Keysign password.

popup_html_reset_desc.message: If you forgot your password, you can clear your data but will have to enter all your keys again.

popup_html_setup_text.message:
Enter a unique Wallet name, and Signing Key below. Your Signing Key will be encrypted on submit.

You may add / remove tnb wallets any time.

popup_html_signingKey.description: When adding an account via Signing key

popup_html_transfer_confirm_text.message:
Please confirm your transfer.
This cannot be undone.

popup_html_unlock.message:
The ultimate tnb wallet. Manage tnb assets, and connect to TNB applications.

Simple. Lightweight. Secure.

popup_master_changed.message: Your master password was changed successfully

popup_password_mismatch.description: when registering a password on keysign

popup_password_regex.message: Your password must be at least 8 characters long and include a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter and a digit or be at least 16 characters long without restriction.
popup_password_regex.description: when registering the master pwd on keysign

popup_pwd_match.message: The new passwords do not match!

popup_sign_buffer.description: On preferences, list of rights that were given to some websites.

popup_sign_tx.description: On preferences, list of rights that were given to some websites.

popup_signed_call.description: On preferences, list of rights that were given to some websites.

popup_utils_full.description: on main page, when rc or mana is full

popup_website.description: On preferences, list of rights that were given to some websites.

unknown_error.message: Something went wrong! Please try again!
